name: Evocator
description:
This is a little game where you play as a little heart trying not to be broken. And when a heart dies, it dies for GOOD, right? Well, maybe not. Perhaps this little heart can call upon the broken hearts of another life to help them out?

In this game, you must survive for as long as you can, and use the zombies of your past lives to keep you going! The game progressively gets much harder so make sure you die as much as possible so that you don't die! Wait..
